name: EVADE TAXES (IN GAME)
description: Hey everyone it's me the guy who made this game I just want to tell you to press the key next to the text that you want to do in order to play this incredible game made by me correctly. Also this game is very important to the over all story of the Broswald connected universe so play it for 500000000000000000000 hours plz and make your friends play it too and sub to me on the youtube chnnel - https://www.youtube.com/@Broswald_Inc/videos
